__e: Willy and me, one day we'll drop in on yours.
I remember another one of granddad and some others.
We wouldn't be Willy and Lily then, would we?
Anyway, Willy's off the case, so... well, it may not seem like it now, Willy... but it's really a blessing in disguise.
